page.title: 06MICHAELCHURCH COURT.
page.content: The building of most interest in our area is{Michaelchurch Court,}the old manor house of the village.The original house is of the{sixteenth} {century}or maybe a little earlier.There are eighteenth century and more recent parts added on. At one time it was the home of the {Traffords.}The most famous Trafford was{Randolph}who made the first airfield in Herefordshire,at Michaelchurch. Mr.Hunter,the biggest landowner in this area also lived there.When he was older he moved out and the building eventually began to fall into{ruins. It was bought my{Mr.McPherson}who is now slowly rebuilding it.Some of the rooms are now used as holiday flats.A swimming pool is being put into what used to be the South wing.
